submission:
class Solution(object):
    def minChanges(self, nums, k):
        zero = [0] * (k+1)
        one = [0] * (k+1)
        i = 0
        j = len(nums)-1
        while i < j:
            zero[abs(nums[i]-nums[j])]+=1
            one[max(nums[i], nums[j], k - nums[i], k - nums[j])] += 1
            j-=1
            i+=1
        i = len(one)-2
        while i >= 0:
            one[i]+=one[i+1]
            i-=1
        mn = 1000000
        for i in range(k+1):
            mn = min(mn, len(nums) - one[i] - zero[i])
        return mn
